name: Narthex (Gregory Avery-Weir)
description:
After a long journey, you will reach the Narthex, the waiting place before the oracle. There you must wait until your time. Then you will be given the answer to a single question. This game has two endings. The second is not worth getting.

This is a Flash prototype from 2010 as a test for a conversation system and an experimental game. The second ending is not worth getting. If you like the feel of this game, check out its followup, Ossuary, which is a full conversation-based adventure game set in a Discordian underworld where sins are tools for change.

If you donate at least $5, you can download full source code and resources for the game. If you're interested in the source for more than one game, check out my Flash Source Code Collection.

Please note: source code is provided without license or support. It might not compile at all, as it may be missing third-party resources.
